name: Sheol (itch)
description:
Investigate the anomalies and stop the aliens from attacking your shuttle.

Note: This game is in EARLY ACCESS! Only one level is currently implemented, but more will be coming soon, along with a story mode.

Controls:

WSAD: Up/Down/Left/Right
Num4/Num6/MouseMouse: Turn Ship
Space Bar/Left Mouse Button: Fire cannons
Tab/Right Mouse Button: Fire teleport shell
Z/Middle Mouse Button: Teleport to T-Shell

Xbox 360 (only tested on Windows):

Commands Listed in same order as above:
Left Stick
Right Stick
Right Trigger
Left Trigger
A Button
